main event: One UFO was sighted at a high elevation, appearing similar to a bright star or planet.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 11 minutes,The object faded to a bluish color at 030 degrees azimuth,The elevation of the object was described as 85 degrees,The object was reported to be reddish-orange in color and approximately 85 ft in diameter,The event involved a U.S. Navy ship, the USS Lansing.
witness description: Navy personnel aboard the USS Lansing
